docs.text: Genie The highly productive Julia web framework Genie is a full-stack MVC web framework that provides a streamlined and efficient workflow for developing modern web applications. It builds on Julia's strengths (high-level, high-performance, dynamic, JIT compiled), exposing a rich API and a powerful toolset for productive web development. Current status Genie is compatible with Julia v1.0 and up. Documentation https://genieframework.github.io/Genie.jl/ Acknowledgements Genie uses a multitude of packages that have been kindly contributed by the Julia community. The awesome Genie logo was designed by Alvaro Casanova (www.yeahstyledg.com).
docs.title: Home
